definition: to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink

sentences.english: You look best in bright red lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 你用灿烂的赤色唇膏看起来最好。

sentences.english: Rosehip Seed Lip Balm Pure plant lip balm for chapped and dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 为干裂的唇部调制的植物性护唇膏。

sentences.english: That’s right, you can purchase lip balm imbued with the delicate flavor of Cheetos.
sentences.chinese: 是的，你可以买到含有奇多奶酪味道的唇膏。

sentences.english: She also wore a hint of red lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 那天，她还涂了少量的红色唇膏。

sentences.english: Don't worry about your lipstick or your height, because it's not going to matter.
sentences.chinese: 别为你的唇膏或身高而愁肠百结，因为这并不紧要。

sentences.english: Cosmetics such as face creams, lipsticks and hair preparations are often based on petroleum.
sentences.chinese: 比如面霜，唇膏和发蜡等化妆品通常也是基于石油的。

sentences.english: Apply lipstick by dtummybisexualng with your finger to create the shape. The colour will look far more naturing.
sentences.chinese: 用手指蘸着唇膏画出唇线，这样唇线看下去更天然。

sentences.english: It's perfect for everyday use and especially at night right before bed so I can wake up to perfect lips.
sentences.chinese: 特别是晚上睡前用，非常棒，是最完美的唇膏了。

sentences.english: Stay out of the sun, or use sunscreen and UV-blocking lip balm.
sentences.chinese: 避免接触阳光或者涂防晒霜，或者防紫外线润唇膏。

sentences.english: Is it possible to find lead-free lipstick?
This is the best lip balm I have ever used.
sentences.chinese: 这是最好的润唇膏我用过。
使用你的颜色最红的唇膏。

sentences.english: And, don't forget your lip balm.
sentences.chinese: 和，请不要忘记您的护唇膏。

sentences.english: Lips dry tell me, I kiss you, do not always let lip balm for your cheap.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇干了告诉我，我吻你，别总让润唇膏占你便宜。

sentences.english: Ginger Lip Balm Pure plant lip balm for chapped and dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 为干裂的唇部调制的植物性护唇膏。

sentences.english: The girl daubed her lips with lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘用唇膏乱涂了一下嘴唇。

definition: bitten-lips look (darker lipstick applied on the inner part of the lips, and lighter on the outer part)
